### Narin Güran disappeared on August 21, 2024, in Tavşantepe, Diyarbakır.

- On the third day, many reporters flocked to the village.  
- The Gendarmerie and JASAT conducted a search for [19 days]{.hl-day}; on September 8, 2024, Narin’s body was found in the Eğertutmaz creek.  
- During this period, the media released hundreds of reports suggesting that the family and the village were involved in the incident.  
- However, on the day Narin was found, footage showed that their neighbor, Nevzat Bahtiyar, had gone to the scene by car.  
- Despite this, Narin’s mother, brother, and uncle received aggravated life sentences, while Bahtiyar was sentenced to [4.5 years]{.hl-year} in prison for tampering with evidence.
